name: A Parroty Game
description:
Created for PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams 2018, with a gleeful disregard for the themes (technical: parody -- get it?, creative: bootleg).

Good art by Corwyn Prichard
Music by Michael Overton (not on Itch)
Giant controller programming by Isaac Goodfellow

The giant controller used in the showcase is a Woodkeys kit.

There's more work to be done here, so keep an eye on this space for improvements.
